##### Contact Us​

Physical Address:  500 Conrad Hilton Blvd, Cisco, TX 76437;

Mailing Address:  P.O. Box 110 , Cisco, TX  76437       

Phone Number:  254.442.2111

Email:  [citymanager@](mailto:citymanager@cityofcisco.com)ciscotexas.gov  or  citysecretary@ciscotexas.gov

**[Click for Instructions for filling out Crash Report](https://nebula.wsimg.com/e3f1f2a5782bbbc11970feae248ea383?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)**

To order a **Crash Report** go online to:  <https://cris.dot.state.tx.us/public/Purchase/>

**City Offices will be closed February 16, 2026, in observance of President's Day.**

TICKET PAYMENTS - Tickets are paid through the [Municipal Court](https://www.cityofcisco.com/court.html). [Click here for Court information and online ticket payments.](https://www.cityofcisco.com/court.html)

"The CodeRED Mobile Alert App delivers information from community officials in areas that are subscribed to the CodeRED Emergency Notification System. Additionally, national organizations used by public safety officials and police departments may utilize the system to send messages to targeted geographic areas." -ECNetwork [**LEARN MORE**](http://ecnetwork.com/iphone/iphone/coderedmobilealert/)

[![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/165bfedcf26344e143b7362f163896b0?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)](http://ecnetwork.com/mobile/getitnow.html)
